name: Belseraph
description: The Angel Pokémon. One kind of Ultra Beast. Belseraph's song is thought to gradually "shift" people into the afterlife if they listen for too long.

abilities.name: Serene Grace
abilities.description: The Move DC to pass a saving throw against one of this Pokémon's moves is increased by 1.

abilities.name: Beast Boost
abilities.description: Upon causing an opponent to faint, this Pokémon increases the ability scores of its saving throw proficiencies by 2 until the end of combat. This is stackable up to a maximum of +10 to any one ability score.
